text:
Gregory H&H
Urbana, Illinois
June 19, 1956
Mr, Seymour M. Siegel, Director
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
Hew York 7, Hew York
Dear By:
^ Thanks for the dope on Prjy Italia, contained
In your letter of June 8.
Yes, if need be, we can spend #100 for French
translation.
In haste, but with best regards.
Sincerely,
FKSsoJf
Fran!'. F, Schooley
President
bcc: Skornia
